about_the_game:
Glitch Daddy

is the new, upcoming game by Sad Mask Party, the twisted brains behind Mango and The Lotus Holidays. It is a surreal, elusive, highly immersive and just slightly distorted tale of mystery, friendship, overcoming obstacles, romance, solitude and all around, love.

It is presented as a first person adventure, featuring atmospheric exploration, puzzles, some fun action sequences and fights, interactive dialogue, deconstructed psychology, weird vibes and an equal mixture of horror(ish) and humorous elements. The graphics are PS1-inspired, but with a healthy dose of surrealism and liminality.

The story starts through a dream where you meet Glitch Daddy, a strange creature informing you about the world's end coming really, really soon. You go on to wake up, and embark on a wild journey where the truth will be revealed, through a series of weird, unexpected twists and turns.

Drenched in a thick vibe of nostalgia, Glitch Daddy seamlessly jumps from the memories of an ideal childhood, to a complicated adulthood, and the cosmic, deconstructed dreamscapes of a timeless oblivion.

Also, you can kill monsters and pet doggos. ;)

content_descriptors.notes: A few mild jumpscares. Often an unsettling, surreal atmosphere and design.
